snippet: Centuries of enmity, and the plane crash that killed President Lech Kaczynski, has Poland on edge on the eve of a championship game with Russia.
abstract: National soccer teams of Poland and Russia will face off in the first round of the Euro 2012 tournament, and tournament organizers are concerned that its festive spirit may be marred by an ugly episode; the two countries have centuries of enmity between them, and a significant minority of Poles believe that Russia was behind the plane crash in 2010 that killed Pres Lech Kaczynski, his wife and 94 others.
lead_paragraph: Centuries of enmity, and the plane crash that killed President Lech Kaczynski, has Poland on edge on the eve of a championship game with Russia.

headline.seo: Poland’s Euro 2012 Match With Russia Goes Beyond Soccer
headline.main: Poles Prepare for Soccer Match Against Russians With a Bitter View to History
headline.print_headline: Poles Prepare for Soccer Match Against Russians With a Bitter View to History
